price: Yaa warra amantan! Faaruu baay’ee Allaah faarsaa.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ ذِكۡرٗا كَثِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū al-laha dhik'ran kathīran
